item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, April 5, 2024 at 2:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Italy seizes assets worth €600mn in connection with alleged EU fraud
2. Private equity stakes unloaded at a discount as investors seek exits
3. Google considers charging for AI-powered search in big change to business model
4.  Billionaires’ love for Trump could backfire
5. British billionaire Joe Lewis avoids US prison in insider trading case
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, April 5, 2024 at 2:00 AM UTC
